sectionsText: Leaflet Map and Elevation Chart Settings
subTitle: Settings for the Leaflet Map and Elevation Chart

param13.description: Show the elevation Chart. Or not.
param13.info: Show the elevation Chart. Or not.

param12.description: Theme for leaflet elevation Chart. Martin-theme is my special theme. Custom theme is customizable in Colours.
param12.info: Theme for leaflet elevation Chart. Martin-theme is my special theme. Custom theme is customizable in Colours.

param11.description: Colour to fill the area under the Elevation profile
param11.info: Colour to fill the area under the Elevation profile

param10.description: Background Colour for the Elevation Chart
param10.info: Background Colour for the Elevation Chart

param9.description: Height of the leaflet elevation chart in pixels (px)
param9.info: Height of the leaflet elevation chart in pixels (px)

param1.info: Provide download link for the GPX-Tracks.

param2.description: Show address of starting point (taken from the first image or GPX-coordinate in the GPX-track)
param2.info: Show start address of the tour. GPX-coords are taken from the first point in the GPX-track or from the first image.

param3.description: Set the Text for the Start Address
param3.info: Text for header above start address

param4.description: Choose which map should be shown first. OpenTopoMap might be slow!
param4.info: Choose which map should be shown first. OpenTopoMap might be slow!

param6.text: Convert and serve local Tiles as webp
param6.description: Convert Tile-Files to webp (conversion settings in PHP only)
param6.info: Convert Tile-Files to webp (conversion settings in PHP only)

param7.text: Maximum Height of Map in px
param7.description: Height of the leaflet map in pixels (px)
param7.info: Height of the leaflet map in pixels (px)

param8.description: Aspect ratio of Map Element on Page (used for responsiveness)
param8.info: Aspect ratio of Map Element on Page (used for responsiveness)
